volvooncall_deprecated.title: Volvo On Call has been replaced
volvooncall_deprecated.description:
The Volvo On Call integration is deprecated and will be removed in a future release. Please migrate to the new Volvo integration which provides improved functionality and better security.

To migrate:
1. Remove this Volvo On Call integration from your configuration
2. Add the new Volvo integration through Settings > Devices & services > Add integration > Volvo
3. Follow the setup instructions to authenticate with your Volvo account using the official Volvo Cars API.
